import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./movies.css"; import sliderControl from "../../Images/slider-control.jpg"; import star from "../../Images/star.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { api_key, fetchDataFromServer } from "../../Api"; function Movies() { const [movieList, setMovieList] = useState([]); const homePageSections = [ { title: "Upcoming Movie", path: "/movie/upcoming" }, { title: "Today's Trending Movies", path: "/trending/moives/week" }, { title: "Top Rated Movies", path: "/movie/top_rate" }, ]; for (const {title, path} of homePageSections){ fetchDataFromServer(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3${path}?api_key=${api_key}&page=1`, setMovieList, title) } return (
